item.title: This House would accept an offer from Imperial
item.author: Bruce M R Weaver,Kristian Lending,
item.description: Proposition: Bruce Weaver We are all aware of Imperial’s academic reputation. I think the academic benefits of attending Imperial College are not disputed, so I will instead focus on why I think the College is good for us, and how the problems are just as bad at other universities. If we were not at …
